replies.body: he got 0.04 more AS and more base AD, 0.04 attack speed isnt much until you factor in W's attack speed boost though.
Just so we are clear, it's BASE attack speed, meaning less % AS required to get to the 2.5 (/5) cap

Kog'maw got over buffed by receiving a buff, his already borderline OP and just not because of the 5 AS forcing him to stand still and the mediocre lane phase.

But fact is have any protection for the guy and his completely OP.

And have a team built around body guarding him and he will Wreck face.

Thresh Support, Lulu Mid, Shen top and Gragas JG with a Kog'maw and just focusing on keeping them off Kog is brutal.
